step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent hold! Your shoulders and elbows are in a good position.
Good job reversing the motion. Your wrists are a little far apart; try to keep them closer together as you return to the start.
Second rep starting well. Focus on keeping your wrists closer together as you clasp your hands.
You're raising your hands effectively. Continue to keep those elbows relatively close as you move them up.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain an upright head position.
Solid hold! Your form looks good here, maintaining the stretch.
You're returning to the start. Try to bring your wrists closer together as you complete the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists closer together when clasping your hands and returning to the start. Remember to maintain an upright head position throughout.
